Tisk Tisk.

Don't you know or understand that those of us who wish to be good RPGers 
will read all posts sent out from the NBW RPG service? Shame on you.  If you 
wish to be added to the BLOCK SENDER LIST and have posts go unread and 
unresponded to, then you can keep up with the unnessassary letters on the 
board.  Now, get your programs and circuits in order and let's get back to 
the RPG. Thank you.

Logo.
